newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - April 1.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi newspapers - April 1.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Aramco announced the construction of a 3.5 million gallon per day regional sewage treatment plant in Abqaiq.
- Saudi Arabia's agriculture and water minister signed a 838 million riyal water project deal.
- Saudi commerce minister holds talks with a German trade delegation on ways to boost bilateral trade.
- Mecca Construction Company's income reached 122 million riyals last year, the company chairman said.
